description: Packed with vegetables and umami flavours, this Asian noodle soup recipe is quick and easy, making it a delicious midweek meal go-to.
name: Asian Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs pickled ginger and 1 tbs sesame seeds, toasted (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add stock, sauces and marinade and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until vegetables have softened. Stir in sesame oil.
Add noodles, mushroom, broccolini, buk choy and spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until softened. Ladle soup into bowls and garnish with pickled ginger and sesame seeds.
